data.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
data.text:
We’ve got our hands on three new hilarious preview clips of Penguins of Madagascar, the upcoming CG animated movie spin-off from Dreamworks:

Penguins of Madagascar – Battle formation

Penguins of Madagascar – We’re not going anywhere with you without knowing who the hell you are.

Penguins of Madagascar – I make my own options.Plot:

“Discover the secrets of the most entertaining and mysterious birds in the global espionage game: Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private now must join forces with the chic spy organization, the North Wind, led by Agent Classified (we could tell you his name, but then… you know), voiced by Benedict Cumberbatch, to stop the villainous Dr. Octavius Brine, voiced by John Malkovich, from taking over the world.”

James Bond is going to lose his job: those penguins are the ultimate spies!

The film is directed by Simon Smith and Eric Darnell.

In theaters: November 26, 2014.

:)

We’ve been sent the French poster of The Penguins of Madagascar, the upcoming CG animated movie spin-off directed by Eric Darnell and Simon J. Smith for Dreamworks Animation:

(Click on the poster to enlarge.)

THE PENGUINS OF MADAGASCAR

Plot:

“Discover the secrets of the most entertaining and mysterious birds in the global espionage game: Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private now must join forces with the chic spy organization, the North Wind, led by Agent Classified (we could tell you his name, but then… you know), voiced by Benedict Cumberbatch, to stop the villainous Dr. Octavius Brine, voiced by John Malkovich, from taking over the world.”

The giant purple cephalopod (yeah am talking about that octopus) on that poster is actually Dr. Octavius Brine, the main villain in the film.

In theaters: November 26, 2014.

:)

Take a look to this new series of funny posters of The Penguins of Madagascar, the upcoming CG animated movie directed by Eric Darnell and Simon J. Smith for Dreamworks Animation:

(Click on a poster to enlarge.) Plot:

“Discover the secrets of the most entertaining and mysterious birds in the global espionage game: Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private now must join forces with the chic spy organization, the North Wind, led by Agent Classified (we could tell you his name, but then… you know), voiced by Benedict Cumberbatch, to stop the villainous Dr. Octavius Brine, voiced by John Malkovich, from taking over the world.”

If I have to be reincarnated as an animal in my next life, I want to be a penguin! What about you?

In theaters: November 26, 2014.

:)

Thanks to Dreamworks Animation we may watch a new extended preview clip of Penguins of Madagascar, the upcoming CG animated movie directed by Eric Darnell and Simon J. Smith:

The Penguins of Madagascar – AntarcticaPlot:

“Discover the secrets of the most entertaining and mysterious birds in the global espionage game: Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private now must join forces with the chic spy organization, the North Wind, led by Agent Classified (we could tell you his name, but then… you know), voiced by Benedict Cumberbatch, to stop the villainous Dr. Octavius Brine, voiced by John Malkovich, from taking over the world.”

One can but be impressed with the skills of those penguins! And they’re hilarious with that! Love those penguins!

Release date: November 26, 2014.

:)

You know the penguins from the Madagascar CG animated movie franchise. But what you don’t know is that they’ve been living a double life as secret agents! Check out this brand new trailer of The Penguins of Madagascar:

THE PENGUINS OF MADAGASCAR

When the world needs saving,

heroes become legends!

From the creators of Madagascar.

Plot:

“Skipper (Tom McGrath), Kowalski (Chris Miller), Rico (John DiMaggio), and Private (Christopher Knights) are brought into the services of the North Wind, an elite undercover inter-species task force that is dedicated to helping animals who can’t help themselves. The Penguins must work with the North Wind led by Classified (Benedict Cumberbatch) in order to prevent Dr. Octavius Brine (John Malkovich) from taking over the world.”

The penguins totally deserve their own movie! And judging from the trailer it’s going to be awesome. Let’s hope the film is the first of a new franchise!

In theaters: November 26, 2014.

:)

You may watch below a first preview clip of Penguins of Madagascar, the upcoming CG animated movie directed by Eric Darnell and Simon J. Smith:

Penguins of Madagascar – A doomsday weapon.Plot:

“Skipper (Tom McGrath), Kowalski (Chris Miller), Rico (John DiMaggio), and Private (Christopher Knights) are brought into the services of the North Wind, an elite undercover inter-species task force that is dedicated to helping animals who can’t help themselves. The Penguins must work with the North Wind led by Classified (Benedict Cumberbatch) in order to prevent Dr. Octavius Brine (John Malkovich) from taking over the world.”

Those penguins are so smart, instead of working for that annoying spy agency, they should turn to the dark side and try to conquer the world!

Release date: November 26, 2014.

:)

We’ve got our hands on the first official poster of The Penguins of Madagascar, the upcoming CG animated movie directed by Eric Darnell and Simon J. Smith for Dreamworks Animation:

(Click on the poster to enlarge.)

THE PENGUINS OF MADAGASCAR

The movie event that will blow their cover.

Discover their untold story!

Plot:

“Skipper (Tom McGrath), Kowalski (Chris Miller), Rico (John DiMaggio), and Private (Christopher Knights) are brought into the services of the North Wind, an elite undercover inter-species task force that is dedicated to helping animals who can’t help themselves. The Penguins must work with the North Wind led by Classified (Benedict Cumberbatch) in order to prevent Dr. Octavius Brine (John Malkovich) from taking over the world.”

James Bond has much to learn from those mighty witty penguins!

You may watch the movie trailer below if you haven’t seen it yet: Continue reading »

Thanks to Dreamworks here’s the first official trailer of The Penguins of Madagascar, the upcoming animated movie spin-off directed by Eric Darnell and Simon J. Smith:

THE PENGUINS OF MADAGASCAR

From the creators of Madagascar.

Plot:

“The most elite team on earth, yep am talking about the penguins, well they are on a crucial mission!

In this new adventure, Skipper (Tom McGrath), Kowalski (Chris Miller), Rico (John DiMaggio) and Private (Christopher Knights) are being recruited by a secret animal organization called North Wind to stop a tentacled new foe named Dave (voiced by John Malkovich) who is scheming to destroy all the penguins of the world.”

Those penguins are so funny, I can’t stop laughing out loud! One can but be fond of them! Can’t wait to see the film!

The voice cast includes Tom McGrath, Chris Miller, Christopher Knights, John DiMaggio, Benedict Cumberbatch, John Malkovich, Peter Stormare, Annet Mahendru, Ken Jeong, and Andy Richter.

The film will open in theaters on November 26, 2014.

:)
